attributes.action: Petition the UK government to reduce the VAT on petrol/ diesel
attributes.additional_details: The burden on the public with current fuel prices are unsustainable
attributes.background: Due to the increase in fuel costs and the extra revenue the government will get in taxes they should reduce VAT on petrol/ diesel

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567

Stop charging VAT on fuel duty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599411
